cases.title: Clock built in React
cases.description: Built a clock by using state in React. Added two buttons, one that pauses the clock and one that makes the clock run again. Used CSS for styling and to make the background change based on the time of the day.

cases.title: Radio player built in React using Sveriges Radios API
cases.description: Created a working radio player by using Sveriges Radio API. Fetched information about the radio channels and playable audio stream urls.
